Name: Hexxon
About the game: Hexxon is a logic puzzle game about connecting hexagons using primary and secondary colors. Features 70 brain-teasing puzzles Progress on a level is saved, so you can come back to it later Relaxing, atmospheric soundtrack 3 hints allotted per level in case you get stumped Built-in level editor -- make and share your own levels!
Meta Title: Hexxon: Oct 3, 2019, Chris Charbonneau and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hexxon? Check out the release date (Oct 3, 2019), developer insights from Chris Charbonneau, and a complete game summary.
